alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 1:25PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lemhi, southeastern Idaho and southwestern Ravalli Counties through 200 PM MDT/100 PM PDT/... At 125 PM MDT/1225 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 37 miles west of North Fork to 27 miles southwest of Salmon. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg and Cobalt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County
